subs.text: I asked ChatGPT for a "list of 25 interesting blogs that regularly update."
Wait But Why - A unique blend of deep philosophical musings, science, and humor.
Smitten Kitchen - Focused on accessible, interesting recipes that work in a small NYC kitchen.
The Points Guy - Offers travel tips and points strategy to help you travel smarter.
HBFIT by Hannah Bronfman - Covers health, beauty, and fitness in a comprehensive way, including video content.
Camille Styles - A healthy lifestyle blog with a focus on food, design, and entertaining guests.
Thirteen Thoughts by Paula - Combines lifestyle content with photography and beauty tips.
goop by Gwyneth Paltrow - A wellness and lifestyle blog that started from a newsletter.
Katie Did What by Katie Michelle Reyes - A personal lifestyle blog focusing on motherhood, fashion, and fitness.
A Beautiful Mess by Elsie Larson and Emma Chapman - Offers DIY, decor, and craft projects with a personal touch.
Corporette by Kat Griffin - Provides fashion and career advice for overachieving women.
Corporate Career Girl by Sarah Johnson Laryea - Empowers women in the corporate world with style and confidence tips.
TechCrunch - Delivers technology news, analysis, and opinions with a focus on startups and Silicon Valley.
Mashable - Covers tech, digital culture, and entertainment content for a dedicated and influential audience.
Gizmodo - Focuses on gadgets, science, and technology, along with a bit of science fiction.
The Verge - Offers in-depth reporting and long-form feature stories on tech and product reviews.
Ars Technica - Publishes news and reviews, analysis of tech trends, and expert advice on tech products.
Wired - Provides a deep look into how emerging technologies affect culture, the economy, and politics.
Boing Boing - A group blog with a diverse range of topics from technology to weird science.
The Atlantic - Features articles in the fields of politics, foreign affairs, business, and the economy.
Vox - Explains the news and world events with in-depth context to help readers understand.
Seth's Blog by Seth Godin - Offers insights on marketing, business, and leadership.
GaryVee by Gary Vaynerchuk - Shares entrepreneurial advice, business strategies, and motivational content.
Zen Habits by Leo Babauta - Focuses on finding simplicity in the daily chaos of our lives.
The Minimalists - Explores living a meaningful life with less stuff for more fulfillment.
Brain Pickings by Maria Popova - An inventory of cross-disciplinary interestingness, spanning art, science, design, history, philosophy, and more.
